effect.x_y: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.

short_effect.x_y: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.x_y: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
